page.title: 05HOME LIFE IN BURTON LAZARS
page.content: This is a day in the home life of my family,on a Saturday. My dad goes to work about 8.30am and goes to Loughborough. My mum goes down to Melton on the 9.30am bus to do the shopping and comes back about 10.30am. My two brothers go to their friends' house.My sister goes to her friend's house as well. I go to Melton to my friend's house who lives on Burton Road. Then we both go down to Melton Market. My dad comes home for his dinner about 2.00pm. My sister and brothers come home about 4.00pm. Then we have tea about 5.30pm.My dad comes back about 7.30pm and has his tea.We are normally out side on our bikes or at our friend's house in the village,then go and watch television.
